events.message: I want to request a refund for my recent order because the product I received is not as described and I am very disappointed.
System has identified that the customer's issue is related to a refund request for an order.
The customer case has been assigned to agent Laura Smith for follow-up and resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request and will do my best to resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want a refund so I can process this for you?
My order number is 987654321. The product was supposed to be a blue leather wallet but I received a black fabric one instead, which is very disappointing.
Thank you for the information. I can arrange a full refund for you once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds good. Please send me the return label as soon as possible so I can send the item back and get my refund.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed promptly.
We are following up to confirm you have received the return label and to check if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the package back. Looking forward to the refund, thanks for your help.
The refund has been successfully processed and credited to your account. We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our customer support regarding your refund request.
